ai-atk-s0402a7:1_1: and the third sign of the modes.
ai-atk-s0402a7:1_2: For the second and also in the case.
ai-atk-s0402a7:1_3: For these reasons are the reasons why all processes, namely form is also called “perception” in all aspects.
ai-atk-s0402a7:2_1: The meaning is that it is associated with equanimous feeling.
ai-atk-s0402a7:3_1: Having arisen in these ten ways, producing conditioned by what is conditioned, and liable to object.
ai-atk-s0402a7:3_2: Without reference to the unconditioned, without thought, the intentional activities do not arise.
ai-atk-s0402a7:3_3: nor do they become established in the paths of fruit,
ai-atk-s0402a7:3_4: In this way too, as far as on the ten respects (performed) teaching the Dhamma in one place.
ai-atk-s0402a7:4_0: The third sub-chapter on offenses is finished.
